content: समाहारः {@--1@} A collection, an aggregate, assemblage; <ls>Māl. 9.</ls> {@--2@} Composition of words. {@--3@} Conjunction of words or sentences. {@--4@} A subdivision of {%Dvandva%} and {%Dvigu%} compounds, expressing an aggregate. {@--5@} Abridgment, contraction, conciseness. {@--6@} Combination of two letters of the alphabet into a syllable (= प्रत्याहार <ab>q. v.</ab>).
